text: Since I was child i always wanted to be a teacher, I think that my mother inspired me a few times. Indeed, she is teacher for twenty years and I used to admire her when she was speaking about her class, preparing her exercices, wondering what she would do to catch the attention of her students... Beside, I made a stage in a class, wich changed me a lot and conforted me about my dream to become a teacher. I always wanted to be useful, helpful in my life, I want to erase social inequalities and give the same access to culture to every child. I also want to sensibilize about questions like the sexism, the racism, the autism and all subjects that children must know and have to be aware of. During the summer vacations, I used to work with childs in animation, I really grew up with this graduation and I love being useful, see how children can be amazed with all sorts of stuff. I enjoyed a lot give animations and answer to their questions, it's very grateful to play with them, learn about them ant teach them some things that can be useful in their lives. I've been to Paris for the third step of my graduation and I loved the environment that I saw in Paris. I also wanted to be really prepared for my first year of licence, for this reason I made a preparatory class in Litterature, this give me qualities like the resilience. My mother helped me a lot and gives me a lot of advices and informations. She awared me of the difficulties of this job and was very honnest with me. I'm very grateful for all she made for me, all the advices, all the experience that she shared with me.
